_description: An Epiphany carol — four quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Hic est filius meus dilectus ipsum audite,’ plus burden (bb): ‘Ihesus autem hodie / Egressus est de virgine’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
When Ihesu Crist baptised wasÞe Holy Gost dessendid by
                    grace…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…At owr last end we pray þe say thanHic est filius
                        meus dilectus ipsum auditeExplicit

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
When jhesus criste baptyȝed wasThe holy gost descended with
                    grace…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Atte oure last ende we pray the say thanHic est filius
                        meus [ipsum audite]
BLAdd5665.Note: Music by John Trouluffe and Richard Smert.
BLAdd5665.Attributed Author:
Hyt ys gode to be gracius sayde john trouluffe (f. 40v), Well
                    Fare thyn herte sayde smerte (f. 41)
